        Constructor of this class
        Parameters:
        parent - the parent class(ZombieShooterGame)
        gameDataJSON - the JSON string of the gamedata.json file
        spriteSheetsJSON - the JSON string of the spritesheets.json file
        spritesJSON - the JSON string ot the sprites.json file
        animatonsJSON - the JSON string of the animations.json file
